channel.title: Good Starting Source
channel.description:
What is A Good Starting source to use? i have been active on the forums but havent been coding or running anything for a while so i am just asking for your guys's opinions on what would be a good starting source to use because i have got some reccomendations to use delta, but im not a fan of delta ( no offence to you delta, or delta users) but yea, i can code somewhat on a scale 1 to 10 i'd say about 4? but if you guys know a good starter source and client if you would, that would be great, i've searched just so you know, but couldnt find anything of my type, Please, and thank you.
~~greg~~

item.title: Good Starting Source
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Eww Delta is nasty. SoulSplit is good but it needs some dupes fixed

item.title: Good Starting Source
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:9, topic:369287”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=465421.msg3403593#msg3403593 date=1290143080]
for not being an idiot and retardedly arguing over it, you get a cookie:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


has some bugs ect that need to be fixed, if you want, i COULD give you my version of it, lots of updates… but i havent planned on releasing it yet.
[/quote]
Stop being a douche, this is server help, and he’s asking for help that’s server related.
I say that you couldn’t put this in a better spot to ask.

The recommended source for new coders is the DeltaScape source.

It is very easy to code, and very known through out this community.
You can ask almost any question about Delta and there could already be a tutorial of it out.
Thanks for asking us.[/quote]
sorry for breaking it to you kid, topics get locked daily for stuff like this in them, and my post is a deltascape…

Read full topic

It is very easy to code, and very known through out this community.
You can ask almost any question about Delta and there could already be a tutorial of it out.
Thanks for asking us.
